dialogs.string: ludum ludum ludum ludum
ludum2 ludum2 ludum2 ludum2
Oh no ...
Oh no? I'm here to help you.
Help? Teleporting stones you have used to get here are one-way tickets. You are traped with us.
And where is here ?
According to the writings on the walls, this place is called sanctuary.
Our only hope out might be to get through this dungeon. Each floor is connected by another teleporting stone.
You gulped. Dungeon? What kind of place is this?
A dangerous one. But I will cast a spell on you, so in case you die you will return here back in time.
If you can cast such a powerful spell, why don't you look for the exit yourself?
We've tried, but after many failed attempts, we lost hope. Maybe you'll have better luck.
What now ? Go and look for the way out !
Right ...
Hmm... I wonder what this is. It looks like some kind of teleporting stone.
I think I might be able to activate it and use it to get inside. It's worth a try.
Hmm... looks like there is no teleporting stone back.
Guess that solves why nobody ever came back from expeditions.
I do wonder where everyone is ... if they are still alive.
Can you believe it? I've finally made it to the ruins, but to my surprise, there's no sign of any expedition members. I wonder what happened to them.
I should get moving.
